verbs.description: [ARG1: The reviews] [V: are] [ARG2: in] : President Donald Trump gave a thumbs - down Sunday to the comedian who roasted his chief spokeswoman at the annual White House Correspondents ' Association dinner , offending present and past members of his administration , including one who walked out in protest .
